tweet: We owe a debt of gratitude to the men and women who served our nation. I am proud to cosponsor the HEARTS Act which removes barriers to wounded veterans reentering the workforce. I am thankful that @WaysandMeansGOP voted to pass this bill out of committee https://youtu.be/URwSDWBC2Q8
